refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: gdiff2 compares the two BRL-CAD models specified on the command line.
The program returns 0 if the files being compared have no differences and the total number of differing objects satisfying the supplied options otherwise (defaulting to all changed objects.

refsect1.title: EXAMPLES
refsect1.para: will create a file named "mged.script" that may be sourced in mged(1) to change uncle.g into aunt.g.
